p: To explore whether OA-10 possesses a broad inhibitory effect on different IAV subtypes, three other IAV strains (PR8, H9N2 and H3N2) were evaluated using IFA and A549 cells at 24 hpi. As shown in Figure S2A and Table 3, OA-10 also exhibited significant inhibitions on PR8 (EC 50: 6.7μM), H9N2 (EC 50: 15.3 μM) and H3N2 (EC 50: 19.6 μM) replications.
